message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $135. This still gives you a great deal, and it allows me to make a fair profit. Let's try to find common ground here!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $135. I'm thinking more along the lines of $130. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
